Title: Series: Prints in Imitation of Drawings
Description: Landscape with the Rest on the Flight into Egypt; in foreground at left Mary with the Christ child sitting on her lap, an angel and Joseph, a donkey grazing nearby, sheep and goats on bank of river at centre, and figure on bridge and classical portico at right; later state, impression with inscription cut off at bottom. 1734 Etching with woodcut from two blocks in grey
Curator's comments: For other impressions, see 2006,U.1103-1104 and 1936,1116.2126.50. For early state without woodblock, see 1977,U.435. For the original drawing in reverse, see 1957,1214.160. For the series, see comment in 1936,1116.2126.1.
Bibliographic references: Hake 1922 / Pond & Knapton's Imitations of Drawing (18)
Liber Veritatis 1978 / Claude Lorrain: Liber Veritatis (154) (after)
